Klasse RobotModel

java.lang.Object
helpers.RobotModel
public class RobotModel extends Object
Represents a robot with its position, direction and name.

  • Konstruktordetails

    • RobotModel

      public RobotModel(int startX, int startY, Direction startDirection, String name)
      Creates a new robot model.
      Parameter:
      startX - the starting x coordinate
      startY - the starting y coordinate
      startDirection - the initial direction
      name - the name of the robot
